block.p: Dara Horn, a daughter of Dr. Susan Horn and Dr. Matthew D. Horn of Short Hills, N.J., is to be married today to Brendan Michael Schulman, a son of Sylvia Schulman and Justice Perry W. Schulman of Winnipeg, Manitoba. Rabbi Azriel C. Fellner is to officiate at the Crystal Plaza in Livingston, N.J.
The couple met at Harvard, from which the bride, 23, graduated summa cum laude and the bridegroom, 26, received a law degree cum laude.

Dara Horn, a daughter of Dr. Susan Horn and Dr. Matthew D. Horn of Short Hills, N.J., is to be married today to Brendan Michael Schulman, a son of Sylvia Schulman and Justice Perry W. Schulman of Winnipeg, Manitoba. Rabbi Azriel C. Fellner is to officiate at the Crystal Plaza in Livingston, N.J.
The couple met at Harvard, from which the bride, 23, graduated summa cum laude and the bridegroom, 26, received a law degree cum laude.

Next month, the bride is to receive a master's degree in modern Hebrew literature from Cambridge University in England and will begin a doctoral program in comparative literature at Harvard, where she will be a Mellon fellow. Her father, a dentist, practices in Union, N.J. Her mother teaches eighth-grade English and United States history at the Warren Middle School in New Jersey.

The bridegroom was until earlier this month a law clerk for Chief Judge William G. Young of the Federal District Court in Boston. In September, he is to become an associate at the New York law firm of Cravath, Swaine & Moore. He graduated cum laude from Yale. His father sits on the Court of Queen's Bench of Manitoba, which is based in Winnipeg.
